resources.string: Logical and result-driven Developer successfully developing elegant, groundbreaking website and application designs for demanding clients with various business objectives. Judicious and creative in project management team leadership and independent problem-solving. Highly organised multitasking with calm and focused demeanour, Translating solutions into code and working across many different APIs. third-party integrations and databases. Solution-driven professional excelling in highly collaborative work environment, finding solutions to challenges and focused on customer satisfaction.
